snippet: Starbucks says Spotify will promote its streaming music service and produce playlists for the coffee chain’s more than 7,000 stores in the United States.
abstract: Starbucks says it will team with streaming service Spotify to produce playlists for its more than 7,000 stores in United States.
lead_paragraph: Starbucks says Spotify will promote its streaming music service and produce playlists for the coffee chain’s more than 7,000 stores in the United States.

headline.main: Starbucks in Deal With Spotify to Stream Music
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Starbucks and Spotify Team Up to Program Playlists in Stores
